response.overview: Eleni, a poor girl who works in a pizzeria, has only one dream, to become an actress. Every day after work, he goes to the theaters, watches the rehearsals and learns the roles, which the others play, by heart. One day luck helps her twice. To replace an actress, who passed away, in a small role and at the same time to meet the man of her life, the young politician Dimitris. However, Dimitris' family has objections and begins to fight the feelings of the two young people...
response.title: Enas koritsaros olo meli
